document.title: Law Student Field Projects in Community Law
document.abstract: This website is an exhibition of student work. It features selected projects in which my law students at the University of Tennessee have collaborated with people in under-represented communities. Many projects have centered on research and innovative education for lay people about some aspect of law or the legal system. In other projects, law students have helped to frame and make justice claims - sometimes focused on relief for individuals, more often seeking a change in social policy.
